title: 在线求助MythicMobs插件的战斗助手怎么关闭
author: 749112221a
txt_content: 就是打了MythicMobs怪物后 会说 你对怪物造成暴击 吸血 什么的那个战斗助手 . 求在哪里关闭

replies.author: 749112221a
replies.txt_content:
吊毛兽 发表于 2018-12-22 14:20
Options:
ShowHealth:false
config里面没有找到呀 . 请告诉我准确在 这个插件的文件夹的哪里 谢谢

replies.author: 749112221a
replies.txt_content:
吊毛兽 发表于 2018-12-22 14:20
Options:
ShowHealth:false
# 
# CONFIGURATION INFORMATION AVAILABLE AT: http://xikage.elseland.net/mythicmobs/

Configuration:
  Version: 2.3
  General:
    AllowMetrics: true
    CheckForUpdates: true
    CompatibilityMode: false
    DebugLevel: 0
    ErrorLogging: true
    UseVolatileFeatures: true
  Clock:
    ClockInterval: 5
    SaveInterval: 5
    SpawnsInterval: 2
    ScannerInterval: 10
    CleanupInterval: 600
  Components:
    CustomSpawners: true
    RandomSpawning: true
  Mobs:
    EnableAIModifiers: true
    EnableTimerSkills: true
    EnableThreatTables: true
    EnablePlayerFactions: true
    EnableLegacySkills: true
    KillMessagePrefix: ''
    ShowHealth:
      Radius: 25
      Format: <mob.name> - <mob.php> (<mob.hp> / <mob.mhp>)
    Scaling:
      Default:
        Enabled: true
        PerBlocksFromSpawn: 250
      world2:
        Enabled: true
        PerBlocksFromSpawn: 250
      world2_nether:
        Enabled: false
        PerBlocksFromSpawn: 100
    DefaultLevelModifiers:
      Health: 0.1
      Armor: 0
      Damage: 0
      KnockbackResistance: 0
      Power: 0
  RandomSpawning:
    GenerateSpawnPoints: false
    MaxMobsPerChunk: 80
    SpawnRadiusPerPlayer: 64
    SpawnRadiusPerPlayerY: 32
    DespawnLazyRandomMobs: true
    PointsPerSecond:
      Land: 10
      Air: 0
      Sea: 0
      Lava: 0
      Ground: 0
  Compatibility:
    Heroes:
      Enabled: true
      ShowXPMessage: true
      XPMessageFormat: You receive <drops.xp> experience for slaying <mob.name>
    McMMO:
      Enabled: true
      ShowXPMessage: true
      XPMessageFormat: You receive <drops.xp> experience for slaying <mob.name>
    SkillAPI:
      Enabled: true
      ShowXPMessage: true
      XPMessageFormat: You receive <drops.xp> experience for slaying <mob.name>
    Vault:
      Enabled: true
      ShowMoneyMessage: true
      MoneyMessageFormat: You receive <drops.money> currency for slaying <mob.name>

replies.author: 浅阳Jenkins
replies.txt_content: 不是这个插件的，在ItemLoreStats这个文件夹找到language-en.yml就能改了

replies.author: 浅阳Jenkins
replies.txt_content: 不是这个插件的兄弟，在ItemLoreStats这个文件夹找到language-en.yml就能改了
